title: Minimalist Scandinavian Duplex in Ołtaszyn – Space, Light, & Function
description: Set over two modern levels, this expansive 5-bedroom duplex in Ołtaszyn marries minimalist Scandinavian elegance with bright, light-filled interiors and functional design. Generous rooms, a sleek open kitchen, and three tranquil bathrooms create an uncluttered feel that maximizes comfort and style. Seamless indoor-outdoor transitions connect the airy living space with a private balcony, ideal for peaceful mornings or relaxed evenings. Premium finishes, including discreet underfloor heating and a state-of-the-art video intercom, underline the home’s quality.
neighborhood_description: Ołtaszyn balances lively urban energy and a growing tech-savvy atmosphere, complemented by easy city access via highway connections. Independent cafés, innovative diners, and diverse shopping enrich the area, while local cultural events draw a creative community. Perfect for those who desire vibrant city living with pockets of tranquility.
lifestyle_benefits: superior privacy while close to city center
target_buyer: Forward-thinking professionals, tech-sector employees, or relocating families seeking functional luxury paired with the dynamism of a well-connected, amenity-rich neighborhood.
market_positioning: This duplex positions itself as a sophisticated choice for discerning buyers moving to Wroclaw; it offers significantly more space and comfort than central apartments, yet provides easy connectivity and modern features ideally suited for those valuing both lifestyle and practical efficiency.
